name: Seal Island
description:
OH NO! Your island is under attack and humans have come to steal your children! Defend your seal babies by gathering coins and spawning in weapons to defend your island. Don’t let the human touch your seal babies! 

Controls:
  •   WASD keys to move
  •   Mouse to click and drag 

- PC/Laptop compatible 

Attributions:

Sound effects obtained from:

  •  https://www.zapsplat.com/ 
  •  https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
  • https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/
